title: NO TRADING IN ARURF?????
body:
Why did you remove trading from arurf? It completely kills all of the fun. :/
Does anyone still enjoy urf with no trading?

Please reply riot, i was really excited when urf came back just to not be able to play who i want :/

replies.body: Game mode is basically ruined.. odds of getting a champ you actually want to play are too low. Really terrible to watch people rerolling champs you really like. Thanks riot. Another awful experience for no reason. 10/10.
yea its actually stupid that they would get rid of trading, it adds nothing to take it away people could decline if they wanted to, now its just harder to get champs you want to play.
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/ogqc0m1m-arurf-weekend-begins?comment=000e0001 I hope this helps :) its a bug they didnt fix
Yes. I hate the no trading. It's so stupid.
